InovacaoTecnologica: Technological innovation, the mark of a pioneer company
PioneirismoInovacao: Pioneering and innovation are characteristics that have been present at Elgin since the beginning of its history. The Refrigeration Division started its activities in 1966 manufacturing hermetic compressors and condensing units. Today, we have a complete portfolio of products and solutions that we export to the most diverse countries worldwide. ELGIN's strategy is to bring innovative, high-quality, after-sales products and support in local product certification in each country.
RefrigeracaoIndustrialTag: Logistics | Warehouse fruit | Seeds | Protein | Bakery | Medicines
RefrigeracaoComercialTag: Hotels | Restaurants | Convenience Stores | Fast Food

ProjetosPersonalizadosTexto: The Development Engineering of Elgin has a highly qualified team prepared to meet customer needs, from standard designs to the design of customized products.
PosVendaTexto: The Elgin knows that each client has its needs, so has an extensive customer service team that is constantly working to address all questions and requests.
AssistenciaTexto: The Technical Assistance of Elgin has a team of specialized mechanics, capable of supporting customers in Start Up procedures and works of surveys throughout Latin America.
SuporteTecnicoTexto: The Elgin has the Technical Support Center, dedicated service to answer questions about technical products and applications quickly and effectively.

RefrigeracaoLeveTexto: Learn the fundamentals and best practices on the refrigeration cycle of refrigerators, beer coolers, drinking fountains and short stature applications.

PoliticaQualidadeTexto: Elgin's Management is committed to supplying the products of the refrigeration lines and ensuring the objectives in: Meeting customer and stakeholder requirements, meeting applicable legal requirements; ensure an adequate environment for the operation of its processes and achieve continuous improvement of the quality management system.
CertificacaoIsoTexto: The Refrigeration division of Elgin has been ISO 9001 certified since 1995 granted by the certifying body ABS Quality Evaluations, accredited by INMETRO.
